Objective function for 2- or 3-parameter Hill model

Source: R/obj_hill.R
obj_hill.Rd

Objective function for 2- or 3-parameter Hill model

Usage

obj_hill(par, log10_conc, resp)

Arguments

par

parameters

log10_conc

base-10 log scale concentration

resp

response

Value

value of the objective function
